headline: Data Center Demand Points This Stock Toward A Buy Point After Major Project Approval
summary: Bloom Energy roared above a buy point in Thursday's stock market action on a key data center project approval.

headline: Should You Hold Equinix (EQIX)?
summary: ClearBridge Investments, an investment management company, released its “ClearBridge Large Cap Growth Strategy” fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. The investment philosophy of the strategy is to invest in leading companies that are undervalued by the market in terms of their future growth potential. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. headline: Assessing Equinix (EQIX) Valuation After A Mixed Year And Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: Equinix stock snapshot after recent performance Equinix (EQIX) has drawn attention after a mixed run, with the share price last closing at US$776.55 and total return over the past year around a 16% decline, despite a positive move in the past month. See our latest analysis for Equinix. The recent 4.95% 30 day share price return contrasts with a weaker 1 year total shareholder return of 16.47% and more moderate 3 and 5 year total shareholder returns, suggesting momentum has picked up lately...
